channel.title: UI Design on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in UI Design on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Ariadne's Thread
item.description: In my Spring and Summer internships at Brunwick’s BI (Boating Intelligence) Design Lab, I helped create a futuristic boating simulation to showcase the company’s future endeavors at CES 2025.
